title: System Health Rollup
description: Figure of Merit (FoM) grid showing CI/CD health metrics over 7 days with color-coded status.

definition.content:
## System Health Rollup

**Figure of Merit (FoM)** values for CI/CD metrics over 7 days.

🟢 Green (0.7-1.0) = Healthy | 🟡 Yellow (0.3-0.7) = Warning | 🔴 Red (0.0-0.3) = Critical
